message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $800000, which is still a great value considering the product's worth. I'm confident you'll see the benefits it can bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value and benefits of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $775000.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to go below $825000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my previous offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $800500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
I respect your position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $790000.

I'm still not willing to go below $825000, Bob. However, I'm willing to make a small concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $812500. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $805000.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $815000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering the value and benefits of the product, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $810000.
